DataElement.preferredName: Person Radiation Therapy Discontinued Prior Registration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to a person having discontinued any treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation prior to registration as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Radiation Therapy Discontinued Prior Registration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person having discontinued any treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation prior to registration as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Discontinued Prior Registration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.:Discontinued; stopped permanently or temporarily.:Earlier in time or order.:The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.
To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.
The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.
